RegionPush.Title: [EN] Honkai: Star Rail HDR Issue
RegionPush.Message:
Heyya Trailblazers!
We have noticed that HoYo have pushed a patch in a way that Collapse currently cannot handle. We are working on the fix but if you need the fix right now you can click the button below to read on how to apply the patch manually!
